metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1046 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: pdns before version 4.1.2 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in dnsreplay. In the dnsreplay tool provided with PowerDNS Authoritative, replaying a specially crafted PCAP file can trigger a stack-based buffer overflow, leading to a crash and potentially arbitrary code execution. This buffer overflow only occurs when the -ecs-stamp option of dnsreplay is used.

criterions.comment: pdns package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
